arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace welcome Liverpool to Selhurst Park on Saturday for a top-of-the-table clash where they will be looking to make history. Oliver Glasner’s side are currently on a 17-match unbeaten run across all competitions. Avoiding defeat against the reigning champions would see them equal their all-time club record of 18 matches without a loss. This […] The post Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner reflects on Crystal Palace’s ‘development over months’ before welcoming league leaders Liverpool
arts.sum: “We know we are able to create chances and to score goals, and when you have this proven over many months, this gives confidence to the team. For that reason, performances and pride mean more to him than records and he hailed the “development over months” that has solidified their structure.

arts.ttl: Glasner confirms double Palace attacking injury boost before Liverpool clash
arts.sum: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner has provided a promising update on the fitness of attacking duo Ismaila Sarr and Yeremy Pino ahead of Saturday’s clash with Premier League champions Liverpool at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Toughest test yet? Liverpool take on Oliver Glasner's formidable Crystal Palace
arts.sum: On Saturday Liverpool will face perhaps their toughest test of the season to date, when they make the trip to London to take on Crystal Palace. Although the Selhurst Park side only finished 12th in...

Crystal Palace's 17-game unbeaten will be put to the test against the champions, but they have fared well against Liverpool recently - drawing at Anfield in May and beating them on penalties in the Co...

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend games predictions - Week 6
arts.sum: The Premier League is back on Saturday and Sunday after the excitement of the midweek Carabao Cup action and Ross Kilvington provides a score prediction for all 10 top-flight matches in England.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool predictions: Reds to gain their revenge
arts.sum: Ross Kilvington expects Liverpool to end Crystal Palace's unbeaten start to the season in what could prove an entertaining contest at Selhurst Park.
